# Bellemonti

> Market-based product management for enterprise software teams. We build great PMs!

## About

Bellemonti is a business consulting company focused on product management, founded by John Garrish. The site features blog posts ("Dispatches") about product management, software development, and building effective teams.

## Main Sections

- [Home](https://bellemonti.com/): Welcome page and latest updates
- [Dispatches](https://bellemonti.com/blog/): Blog posts on product management and software
- [Reading](https://bellemonti.com/reading/): Curated articles and resources

## Key Topics

- Product management best practices
- Enterprise software development
- Team building and leadership
- Software business fundamentals
- AI tools for product managers (Cursor, Claude Code)
